TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Palinkaan, title = Palinkaan, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Palinkaan} }

S.FORM: Palinkaan kakilimaan u sulit nu Hulam 復興部落 u siwkay nu niyazu' i Hualien a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Palinkaan. u kasalumaluma' nu Palinkaan sa, 543 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 1,537 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu yingcumin sa, 480 ku tademaw, pakalatu 31%. u zuma sa, cay ku yingcumin, 1,057 ku tademaw, pakalatu 69%. nilacul u Pangcah a niyazu' u kasabinacadan, Pangcah(Amis) 17%, Taluku(Truku) 8%, Yuwatan(Bunun) 2%, Paywan(Paiwan) 1%, Tayan(Tayal) 1%, Sakizaya 1%, zumazuma 1%. u Pangcah a tademaw u Pangcah a niyazu' kuyni. katuud ku Pangcah itini mueneng. u zuma a tademaw sa u Yuwatan u Tayan atu Taluku. yadah ku cidekay a tademaw itini. u Sakizaya a tademaw inayi' ku Sakizaya a tademaw mueneng itini, hakay izaw tu, caay henay misumad ku cidekay a ngangan nu Sakizaya. u cidekay nu Taywan Yuancumin u siwkay nu Yincumin u Yincumin sananay, u saayaway a muenengay a tademaw itini, itini uyiniyan a subal. u sasubana'ay a kamu sa, Taywan Yincumin sa mikitinay "Timul Subal kamu cidekay " saan. u niyazu' sa, u luyaluy nu tademaw, pulung muengeneng, u kabana' kami, hina u lalumaay amin i niyazu', caay kayadah ku ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamu, atu kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tumuk) saca babalaki mililid tu niyazu'. i Taywan Yincumin, izaw ku 16 cidekay puluung sa 748 a niyazu', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ku Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ku Laaluwa. u tabakiaya a niyazu' sa, ku Tapalong, u niyazu' nu Pangcah(Amis). tademaw nu Yuancumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2017 a mihcan 12 a bulad tademaw nu Yuancumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2018 a mihcan 5 a bulad pulung sausi (561,916), Pangcah (209,668), Tayan (90,185), Paywan (100,775), Yuwatan (58,465), Rukay (13,319), Puyuma (14,170), Cou (6,635), Saysiat (6,630), Yami (4,612), Saw (790), Kabalan (1,470), Taluku (31,530), Sakizaya (940), Sejek (10,023), Laaluwa (401), Kanakanabu (335), zuma (11,985)

Palinkaan kakilimaan o solit no Holam 復興部落 o siwkay no niyazo' i Hoalien a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Palinkaan. o kasalomaloma' no Palinkaan sa, 543 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 1,537 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no yingcomin sa, 480 ko tademaw, pakalato 31%. o zoma sa, cay ko yingcomin, 1,057 ko tademaw, pakalato 69%. nilacol o Pangcah a niyazo' o kasabinacadan, Pangcah(Amis) 17%, Taloko(Troko) 8%, Yowatan(Bonon) 2%, Paywan(Paiwan) 1%, Tayan(Tayal) 1%, Sakizaya 1%, zomazoma 1%. o Pangcah a tademaw o Pangcah a niyazo' koyni. katood ko Pangcah itini moeneng. o zoma a tademaw sa o Yowatan o Tayan ato Taloko. yadah ko cidekay a tademaw itini. o Sakizaya a tademaw inayi' ko Sakizaya a tademaw moeneng itini, hakay izaw to, caay henay misomad ko cidekay a ngangan no Sakizaya. o cidekay no Taywan Yoancomin o siwkay no Yincomin o Yincomin sananay, o saayaway a moenengay a tademaw itini, itini oyiniyan a sobal. o sasobana'ay a kamo sa, Taywan Yincomin sa mikitinay "Timol Sobal kamo cidekay " saan. o niyazo' sa, o loyaloy no tademaw, polong moengeneng, o kabana' kami, hina o lalomaay amin i niyazo', caay kayadah ko ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamo, ato kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tomok) saca babalaki mililid to niyazo'. i Taywan Yincomin, izaw ko 16 cidekay poloong sa 748 a niyazo', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ko Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ko Laalowa. o tabakiaya a niyazo' sa, ko Tapalong, o niyazo' no Pangcah(Amis). tademaw no Yoancomin, polong saosi katokoh 2017 a mihcan 12 a bolad tademaw no Yoancomin, polong saosi katokoh 2018 a mihcan 5 a bolad polong saosi (561,916), Pangcah (209,668), Tayan (90,185), Paywan (100,775), Yowatan (58,465), Rokay (13,319), Poyoma (14,170), Coo (6,635), Saysiat (6,630), Yami (4,612), Saw (790), Kabalan (1,470), Taloko (31,530), Sakizaya (940), Sejek (10,023), Laalowa (401), Kanakanabo (335), zoma (11,985)
